verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Unless a grain of wheat
Falls into the earth
And dies, it remains alone.
But if we hate our lives here on this earth
We'll keep it to life eternal
And bear much fruit.
Chorus:
I lay it down,
No one takes it from me,
So that I might take it up
Another day.
And this is why
My Father loves me
Because I have chosen
To walk this way.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
THerefore let us not
Judge one another any more
But determine this
Not to put an obstacle
Or stumbling block
In our brother's path.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When I was younger
I would gird myself
And go where I wanted to
But now that I am older
Another girds me
And takes me
Where I would not.
